title: Can I haz this, please ?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/YWmWTaC.png

I use the death recap a lot to plan my defensive build but it's really not practical and buggy as hell. A menu like this could be available during all the game, it would be awesome. Sometimes it's hard to estimate what kind of damage I take, especially when facing champions I don't know well.

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/4a/4aa048a2e8477b38e2dc442c2f5117d0d9c305a30f2d64e1ebc4c52f9792ecf7.jpg

Please upvote if you like it :)

PS: Please don't mind the actual figures. I don't even know if Darius has true damage, I just needed some for the chart :P

replies.body:
Yes. This is definitely needed in the game. Graphs are exponentially easier to read than whatever riot implemented with their death recap.

You know, the one where it says flash did 20 true dmg to me after I died (lol).

> [{quoted}](name=TallyZrg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUkGRbjU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-24T16:19:34.488+0000)
>
> Yes. This is definitely needed in the game. Graphs are exponentially easier to read than whatever riot implemented with their death recap.
> 
> You know, the one where it says flash did 20 true dmg to me after I died (lol).

that last line is the stupidest thing I've heard in League

Must not have been around for all the game breaking bugs.

part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ibwxee_lOqo
part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BPNOXnJGeg8
part 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URFZU_f20lw
Only joined this year. Show me anything before Christmas 2015 and I will not know what you mean

was all stars in that time frame?

well there was the snowball bug on snowdown that caused i forget who to die twice because it took him all the way to fountain.

and yes this was definitely a bug because damage should stop recall unless it is within the last like .25--.5 seconds and the damage that snowball does when it hits it's target should have stopped those recalls since they were not in that time frame yet.

*Release Black Cleaver

Search up old videos lmao

That would explain it. xD

I joined back in Season 2 when we still had the double knock-up sending champions to the ceiling of Summoners Rift.

A lot of the bugs in Alpha / Beta / Season 1 I never saw, but always thought they looked hilarious when I watched them in the above videos.

The multiple knockups thing definitely still happens, at least sometimes.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NFDwcErdyv8

This is one of my favorite examples.

That double knock up to the ceiling of the rift still happens, just not so much

I remember on a Kshaway wood division adventures video that happened to I think a Fizz

Oh Really? I remember when I played Vel'koz one for all that even multiple knock-ups (4-5) didn't cause it.

I believe that it can still happen though, I occasionally see bugs in my games still that make me go "wat".

Azir's wall caused me to go almost off the screen when i w'd something as pantheon, pretty interesting.
http://plays.tv/video/572e5e05edbe5d62f7/waaat?from=user
It tends to happen more often when the knock-up occurs during a dash or pull/knock-back.

must not be multiple knock ups then

might be a knock up and then it glitches with a movement, like Fizz's E on the same frame as the knock up, causing him to go so high
Try out Vel'koz E and Darius E. My friend flew up for about 8 seconds as Sivir.

> Only joined this year

You picked the shittiest year to join

Good to know


At least I can comprehend saying that someone should have their family get cancer and die in a burning hole just because we are losing is unkind
lol those death recap numbers are usually bogus anyways.

> [{quoted}](name=DirkTarTar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUkGRbjU,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-05-24T16:56:33.595+0000)
>
> lol those death recap numbers are usually bogus anyways.

Remind me more about how ghost did damage to me somehow.

> [{quoted}](name=ClapDatAshe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUkGRbjU,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-24T23:00:47.362+0000)
>
> I got Smited by a {{champion:64}}  with a {{item:1408}}...
> 
> It even registered as magic damage!
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

What's worse is when you were somehow dealt true damage when the enemy champion (a) didn't have any true damage abilities (2) didn't get ignite (3) didn't even have smite (4) didn't have red buff. The mystery is where the true damage came from. It's usually not much, but it DOES show up.
Sorc pot?

> [{quoted}](name=Whatchmacallit,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUkGRbjU,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-25T15:29:48.917+0000)
>
> Sorc pot?

Which is funny because this was before anybody started even considering elixirs.
lmao I'm certain that the top 3 damage dealing abilities to my 1700 hp when i died was the 300 damage ignite, 150 Sion shield, and 41.3 from a caster minion.

i don't mind what riot implemented, a graph would be much better, but the problem is that it is so extremely buggy and doesn't supply ENOUGH information even when it isn't bugged out that it's useless.
defiantly makes it more clear and easy to read. I'd say have it highlight the enemy champ that did the most damage as well for that little bit of extra clarity.

Thanks for the feedback ! I didn't intend to come up with a good layout overnight anyway haha. You'll notice that the champions were sorted in percentage of total damage dealt to you ;)
Well, anyway, I'm sure Riot UI designers could do something awesome, would they want to add such a feature. I'm just planting a seed here, maybe it'll grow into something, maybe not :)
Great idea. I'm sure Riot will make it a priority which means we'll see it sometime in Season 11!
What does the "Last Shop" mean?

Damage taken since the last time you bought an item in the shop. I can see why it's not clear though, my apologies, English isn't my language and I was tired ( which means I didn't really try that hard \o/).
I guess you could call it "_Current Items_".
Okay, I think I get it. It'd be cool if you could open Death Recap while alive, like in Smite.
too useful.  won't happen
I imagine something like that would be after the client update.
It's not related. This is in-game, they can implement it right now, and it won't be lost when the client upgrade will be released. It's not wasted work.

Actually, it is related. The old client is hard to work with and unoptimized, adding something like this would be a nightmare. It's why we don't have thing like being able to move around mastery and rune pages (a feature coming with the new client)

No it's not related, because the client with your profile and the game proper are 2 completely different and unrelated software. They can add pieces and features in-game without affecting the client, neither old nor new.

This is wrong, the air client and the game client are two different things. The air client is the login screen, summoner profile page, etc, while the game client is the actual ingame part where we CS. The client update is air client only, the game client isn't being changed at all. 

This change would be a change to the game client, not the air client.

This would require Riot to update from an outdated Adobe client and relaunch the game with a far superior engine.  Which at this rate will never happen.  Each time they add something new to the archaic design, they break something else. They might as well just relaunch the game at this point.
If they can't even get the current death recap to work properly, i think this new one would make the game explode.
I wonder what 120% true damage from your own smite even though you have heal and flash would look like in a graph.

A damage mitigated meter would be nice too. Not necessary, but nice. 

Also it would be cool if you could bring up the death menu after you have already respawned. That way you can watch on and see if your team steals drag or something and not lose the information that you are getting from the death screen. 

One thing that deserves pointing out is, by switching to this pie chart style, you are losing some information about your death. The abilities used on you are, IMO, just as important as the type of damage dealt
What? Don't you love it when you do 3 true damage to yourself?
{{champion:268}}  always needs that 3 true damage to himself. Helps balance him :). Rito OP ;P
This would be a great addition and would escpecially help when trying to get a defensive build!

death recaps hopefully get updated with the new client because the current ones are as old as the client itself. We also need to be able to click on the champions and see details, how much damage from basic attack how much of it was it crit? how much from abilities? how much from items? defiine mixed damage. also repetitions. how many basic attacks? how many times did Karthus Q you? etc etc. RIto plz.

I'd like this, but I'd like to see the sections further broken down in the pie graph.

Like, I'd like to see a section for Elise, then that section broken down into the physical and magical damage she did, then see another section for Caitlyn and the physical damage she did to me.
better death recap >>>>>>>>>>>>> dynaboost

Death recap needs a serious update. In your version, I'm kind of missing the ability that killed you. Often I am like "what just happened?" when I died in a second and I use DR to see how I got killed. However, the current one is also terrible at that since it only lists 3 things per champion and 3 enemies max.

On the other hand, Death Recap shouldn't become too complex because it would distract you for too long (while dead, you should be buying items and planning where to go next). I think your version is doing really well at giving information at a blink of an eye. While it's not yet perfect, it's 10 000 times better than the current one.
A lot of people argue that league is getting too easy for people to pick up. This will only further the gap between the Vets and the Newbies. Although i commend you for thinking this up
Wtf? Don't be stupid guys. I'm pretty sure this minion's 12 damage killed me. I mean, revive has stopped killing me, so death recap must be ok now.
this cat is extremely cute
